posts.title: Grand Central Library Events and News: March 2020
posts.text: This month's events include a Census recruitment event, a mini meditation retreat, tax prep, children's story time and much more.

posts.title: Grand Central Library Events and News: February 2020
posts.text: There's so much happening this month—come in and take part!

posts.title: Grand Central Library Events and News: January 2020
posts.text: The Grand Central branch has lots in store for January! Storytime, kids crafts, English conversation, book discussions and much more...

posts.title: Grand Central Library Events and News: December 2019
posts.text: This month's events include a book discussion, a Q&A with legendary critic Robert Christgau, and holiday crafts for kids!

posts.title: Grand Central Library Events and News: November 2019
posts.text: Looking for a great book recommendation? Want to meet an author? Need some great playtime with your little ones? The Grand Central branch offers all that and much more.

posts.title: Grand Central Library Events and News: October 2019
posts.text: Don't miss upcoming book talks, a Saturday event with the creators of two of the most-talked about graphic novels of 2019, and plenty of kids activities, including an early literacy Monster Mash!

posts.title: Grand Central Library Events and News: September 2019
posts.text: This month's highlights include documentary film screenings, celebrations of humorist James Thurber and music legend Miles Davis, and an author talk about the 1969 Miracle Mets.

posts.title: Grand Central Library Events and News: August 2019
posts.text: This month's highlights include a two-part art adventure, a jazz event, and plenty of activities for kids. Reserve your spot for your favorites today!

posts.title: Grand Central Library Events and News: July 2019
posts.text: Early literacy events. Book discussions. 3D printing classes. Meditation, kids events, Spanish conversation, and more - it's all happening this summer at Grand Central.

posts.title: Grand Central Library Events and News: June 2019
posts.text: Get started on your summer reading and viewing list, and join us at Grand Central for a special film screening, an author talk, a book discussion, and a variety of children's programs. See details!

posts.title: Grand Central Library Events and News: May 2019
posts.text: With spring just about here, stop by our Grand Central location for everything from a meditation class or an anniversary screening of the classic Chunking Express, to a talk about the Yankees in popular culture, or storytime for little ones. They've got it all!

posts.title: Grand Central Library Events & News: April 2019
posts.text: April events include Immigrant Heritage Week editions of some regular meet-ups, kids activities for National Poetry Month, and early literacy programs in a multitude of languages.

posts.title: Grand Central Library Events & News: March 2019
posts.text: Whether you'd like to learn meditation, get help with Social Security planning, join a book talk about Mets baseball, or meet a bestselling comic book author, the Grand Central Library is your destination in March.

posts.title: Grand Central Library Events & News: February 2019
posts.text: Discover upcoming author talks, film screenings, kids and teen programs, and even a new career opportunity.

posts.title: Grand Central Library Events & News: January 2019
posts.text: Start the new year with the diverse educational and cultural programming available at the Grand Central! Check out January's film screenings, book discussions, kids events, and more.

posts.title: Grand Central Library Events & News: December 2018
posts.text: Come in from the winter cold for another month of film screenings, author talks, kids reading, and more!

posts.title: Grand Central Library Events & News: November 2018
posts.text: Check out this month's author talks, film screenings, kids events, and more, all at Grand Central!

posts.text: From staff recommendations to author events and kids programs, see what's going on this month at the Grand Central Library!

posts.text: From staff recommendations for books and movies to this month's branch happenings, check out the July calendar for the Grand Central Library.
